content.question: The bar magnet shown has three Gaussian surfaces drawn, each enclosing a different part of the bar magnet. Through which Gaussian surface is the magnetic flux <math alttext="the contour integral of vector B dot d vector A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>∮</mo><mover accent="true"><mi>B</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>⋅</mo><mi>d</mi><mover accent="true"><mi>A</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> the greatest, if any?

choices.label: It is the same through all three surfaces

content.answer: It is the same through all three surfaces

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
